title: Log a user in
name: PostLogin
description: This endpoint logs a user into the site and generates an access token for them if successful.

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content:
curl -X POST
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"
     -d '{"email": "josh@company.com", "password": "josh123"}'
     https://synergyims.me/api/auth/login

Success 200.description: The bearer token for the user to authenticate with.
The epoch time of when the token expires.

Error 4xx.description: The password provided did not match the password for the user.
No user with the provided email was found in the database.
The caller must provide all the parameters and as the correct type.

title: Log a user out
name: PostLogout
description: This endpoint logs a user out of the system and revokes their access token from being used further.

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content:
curl -X POST
     -H "authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpX...PrjmfH2E"
     https://synergyims.me/api/auth/logout

examples.title: Success-Response:

Error 4xx.description: A valid bearer token must be provided in the authorization header.

title: Register a new company and user
name: PostRegister
description: This endpoint registers a new user as owner along with creating a new company for that user.

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content:
curl -X POST
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"
     -d '{"company_name": "Macrosoft", "address": "1280 Main St. W", "company_phone": "999-999-9999", ...}'
     https://synergyims.me/api/auth/register

Parameter.description: The phone number of the new company.
The first name of the new user.
The last name of the new user.
The email address of the new user.
The phone number of the new user.
The employee number of the new user.

Success 200.description: The bearer token for the user to authenticate with.
The epoch time of when the token expires.

Error 4xx.description: The caller must provide all the parameters and as the correct type.
The email address provided must be unique.

title: Verify a user's access token
name: PostVerify
description: This endpoint verifies the validity of a user's access token.

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content:
curl -X POST
     -H "authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpX...PrjmfH2E"
     https://synergyims.me/api/auth/verify

Success 200.description: The name of the user's registered company.
The permissions tree of the user's registered company.
The decoded payload section of the user's provided access token.

Error 4xx.description: A valid bearer token must be provided in the authorization header.
The token provided by the user is either expired, revoked or invalid.

title: Delete brand
name: DeleteBrand
description: This endpoint deletes a brand.

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content:
curl -X DELETE
     -H "authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpX...PrjmfH2E"
     https://synergyims.me/api/brand/87

examples.title: Success-Response:

Error 4xx.description: A valid bearer token must be provided in the authorization header.
The user must have the correct permissions in their company.

title: Get brand
name: GetBrand
description: This endpoint returns a specific brand based on the given brand id.

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content:
curl -X GET
     -H "authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpX...PrjmfH2E"
     https://synergyims.me/api/brand/87

Error 4xx.description: A valid bearer token must be provided in the authorization header.
The user must have the correct permissions in their company.
The provided id must be a valid number.

title: Get brands
name: GetBrands
description: This endpoint returns the brands and their information that the user's company has stored.

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content:
curl -X GET
     -H "authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpX...PrjmfH2E"
     'https://synergyims.me/api/brand?limit=10&offset=0'

Parameter.description: The number of entries to return (for pagination).
The number of entries to offset the returned entries by (for pagination).

Error 4xx.description: A valid bearer token must be provided in the authorization header.
The user must have the correct permissions in their company.

title: Update brand
name: PatchBrand
description: This endpoint updates a brand with the provided information.

     -d '{"brand_name": "Apple", "description": "Expensive stuff!"}'
     https://synergyims.me/api/brand/87

examples.title: Success-Response:

Error 4xx.description: A valid bearer token must be provided in the authorization header.
The user must have the correct permissions in their company.
The data provided must be of the correct type.
The provided id must be a valid number.

The user must have the correct permissions in their company.
The permissions tree must follow the exact structure.

Error 4xx.description: A valid bearer token must be provided in the authorization header.

title: Import CSV of products
name: ImportProducts
description: This endpoint creates products from the information of an imported CSV. The CSV headers must be exactly as follows: {item_name,description,price,quantity,serial_num}. Note that due to issues with Readable streams this endpoint will silently fail (i.e not import any products but report successful).

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content:
curl -X POST
     -H "authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpX...PrjmfH2E"
     -F "csvFile=@/path/to/test.csv"
     https://synergyims.me/api/product/import

Parameter.description: The delimiter used in the CSV file.

examples.title: Success-Response:

Error 4xx.description: A valid bearer token must be provided in the authorization header.
The user must have the correct permissions in their company.
The data provided must be of the correct type.

title: Update product

     -H "authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpX...PrjmfH2E"
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"
     -d '{"brand_id": 32, "category_id": 12, "item_name": "Gala Apple", ...}'
     https://synergyims.me/api/product

Parameter.description: The new serial number of the product.
The id of the brand this product belongs to (set to 0 if none).
The id of the category this product belongs to (set to 0 if none).
The id of the warehouse this product is stored at (set to 0 if none).

examples.title: Success-Response:

Error 4xx.description: A valid bearer token must be provided in the authorization header.
The user must have the correct permissions in their company.
The data provided must be of the correct type.
The provided id must be a valid number.

     https://synergyims.me/api/warehouse

Parameter.description: The phone number of the new warehouse.

examples.title: Success-Response:

Error 4xx.description: A valid bearer token must be provided in the authorization header.
The user must have the correct permissions in their company.
The data provided must be of the correct type.
